name: illumine (itch)
description:
Illumine is a roguelike.

However, illumine's world is not a static procedurally generated place. In illumine the player interacts with the environment, triggering its dynamical transformation.

Each situation then becomes a self-contained puzzle, which the player can approach from any angle and deal with however he wants, whether by stealth or by manipulating the AI.

illuminegame.com

Key features

  • a game about discovery
  • a game that encourages creative solutions: stealth, AI manipulation...
  • a gameplay-driven soundtrack
  • a different take on the roguelike genre
  • lots of letters


Recommended

Headphones, a 360 controller or any XInput gamepad.


Current Status

The game is out for Windows and Linux.


Credits

Design, audio, visuals and programming by Julien Ribassin

Additional design by Laurette Piani
